global_missing_permission_bot:
The bot is missing crucial permission to perform this command! Please check the bots permission.
{missing}
global_user_not_found: {emote_warn} Could not find the specified user
global_channel_not_found: {emote_warn} Could not find the specified channel
global_logging_unban_auto: `[{timestamp}]` {emoji} **{target_tag}** `({user_id})`has been {action} by **{moderator_tag}** `({moderator_id})` after their temporary punishment expired `[#{infractionId}]`
global_not_in_voice: {emote_warn} User is not connected to a Voice Channel!
global_unknown_error: {emote_warn} An unknown error has occurred, please try again later or if you are still experiencing this issue contact the developers
global_cannot_action_self: {emote_warn} You cannot perform this action on yourself!
global_cannot_action_owner: {emote_warn} You cannot perform this action on the server owner!
global_cannot_action_role_equal: {emote_warn} You cannot perform this action on **{user_tag}** as you do not have a higher role than them!
global_cannot_action_role_equal_bot: {emote_warn} You cannot perform this action on **{user_tag}** as I do not have a higher role than them!
global_cannot_action_role_higher: {emote_warn} You cannot perform this action on **{user_tag}** as they have a higher role than you!
global_cannot_action_role_higher_bot: {emote_warn} You cannot perform this action on **{user_tag}** as they have a higher role than me!
global_cannot_action_bot_self: {emote_warn} You cannot perform this action on the bot!
premium_message: This is a premium command, become a Patreon and get access to it <https://www.patreon.com/bulbbot>
event_channel_update_topic_updated: <#{channel_id}> channel topic was changed from `{oldchannel_topic}` to `{newchannel_topic}`
event_member_update_nickname: {emote_warn} **{user_tag}** `({user_id})` has changed their nickname from `{nick_old}` to `{nick_new}`
event_member_update_role_add: {emote_warn} The **{role}** role has been added to **{user_tag}** `({user_id})`
event_member_update_role_remove: {emote_warn} The **{role}** role has been removed from **{user_tag}** `({user_id})`
event_member_update_role_add_audit: {emote_warn} The **{role}** role has been added to **{user_tag}** `({user_id})` by **{moderator_tag}** `({moderator_id})`
event_member_update_role_remove_audit: {emote_warn} The **{role}** role has been removed from **{user_tag}** `({user_id})` by **{moderator_tag}** `({moderator_id})`
config_language_success: {emote_success} Successfully changed server the language to `{language}`
config_language_invalid_args:
{emote_warn} Invalid language provided!
{emote_wrench} Select a valid language from `{languages}`
config_logging_invalid_channel: {emote_warn} Cannot resolve `{channel_name}` as a valid channel!
config_logging_unable_to_send_messages: {emote_warn} Cannot post messages in that channel
config_mute_unable_to_manage: {emote_warn} Unable to manage that role, move my role higher than that role for it to work
override_create_invalid_part: {emote_warn} Missing required argument `part`, can be either `role` or `command`
override_create_less_than_0: {emote_warn} The clearance level can't be less than or equal to 0
override_create_more_than_100: {emote_warn} The clearance level can't be more than or equal to 100
override_create_higher_than_yourself: {emote_warn} You cannot create an override with a higher clearance level than your clearance level
override_create_success: {emote_success} Successfully created an override with the clearance level of `{clearance}`
override_edit_invalid_part: {emote_warn} Missing required argument `part`, can be either `role` or `command`
override_edit_less_than_0: {emote_warn} The clearance level can't be less than or equal to 0
override_edit_more_than_100: {emote_warn} The clearance level can't be more than or equal to 100
override_edit_higher_than_yourself: {emote_warn} You cannot create an override with a higher clearance level than your clearance level
override_edit_non_existent_override_comm: {emote_warn} No override was found for that command, you need to create an override to be able to edit it
override_edit_non_existent_override_role: {emote_warn} No override was found for that role, you need to create an override to be able to edit it
override_edit_success: {emote_success} Successfully updated the override with a new clearance level of `{clearance}`
override_remove_invalid_part: {emote_warn} Missing required argument `part`, can be either `role` or `command`
override_remove_non_existent_override_co: {emote_warn} No command override was found with that name
override_remove_non_existent_override_ro: {emote_warn} No role override was found with that id/mention
automod_missing_limit: {emote_warn} Missing required argument `limit`, can be any value higher `0`
automod_missing_item_remove: {emote_warn} Missing required argument `item` that should be removed from the automod
automod_missing_punishment: {emote_warn} Missing required argument `punishment`, can be either `LOG`, `WARN`, `KICK` or `BAN`
automod_not_already_in_database: {emote_warn} Item `{item}` is not already in the automod
automod_already_in_database: {emote_warn} Item `{item}` is already in the automod
automod_updated_limit: {emote_success} Updated the limit on `{part}` with a limit of `{limit}`
automod_updated_punishment: {emote_success} Updated the punishment on `{part}` with a new punishment of `{punishment}`
help_command_not_found: Unable to find any commands with that name
jumbo_invalid_emoji: {emote_warn} Invalid emoji, please use a valid emoji
jumbo_too_many: {emote_warn} Too many emoji, the bot currently only supports a max of 10 emojis at a time

Emote slots: **150**
Audio quality: **256** kbps
Upload limit: **50 MB**
serverinfo_booster_tier_3:
Emote slots: **250**
Audio quality: **384** kbps
Upload limit: **100 MB**
already_banned: {emote_warn} **{target_tag}** `({target_id})` is already banned with the reason `{reason}`
purge_too_many: {emote_warn} Can only purge a max of 200 messages at a time
purge_too_few: {emote_warn} You cannot purge less than 1 message :confused: why would you even do that
verification_non_integer: {emote_warn} Level needs to be an integer
verification_community_zero: {emote_warn} Verification level cannot be set to `0` for community servers!
verification_level_error: {emote_warn} Verification level cannot be greater than `4` or less than `0`
ping_latency:
Bot latency is **{latency_bot}ms**
WebSocket latency is **{latency_ws}ms**

privacy_policy: 📜 View the privacy policy of the bot **[here](https://www.notion.so/Bulbbot-Privacy-Policy-cc22832e352145759d335132a956a252)**
github_source_code: {emote_github} This bot is fully open source and you can find all of the source code **[here](https://github.com/TestersQTs/Bulbbot)**
inviteinfo_error: {emote_warn} Unable to find a guild with that invite
slowmode_invalid_0s: {emote_warn} Slowmode duration cannot be lower than **0 seconds**!
slowmode_invalid_6h: {emote_warn} Slowmode duration cannot be higher than **6 hours**!
tempban_invalid_0s: {emote_warn} Duration cannot be lower than **0 seconds**!
tempban_invalid_1y: {emote_warn} Duration cannot be higher than **1 year**!
lockdown_not_boolean: {emote_warn} Argument `lock` value must be a Boolean! (`true` or `false`)
mute_muterole_not_found:

mute_not_muted: {emote_warn} The specified user is not currently muted!
mute_already_muted: {emote_warn} The specified user is already muted!
infraction_list_not_found: {emote_warn} This guild does not seem to have any infractions!
infraction_claim_success: {emote_success} You have claimed responsibility over infraction **#{infractionId}**
infraction_invalid_arguments: {emote_warn} Missing required argument `action`, can be one of the following `delete|remove`, `info`, `list|all`, `msearch|modsearch`, `osearch|offendersearch`, `search`, `claim`, `update`
